info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 07 at 3:09AM MDT until April 07 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 24 expected. The lower San Juan River Valley west of Bluff will remain closer to freezing. * WHERE...In Utah, Eastern Uinta Basin, Arches/Grand Flat, Canyonlands/Natural Bridges and Southeast Utah. In Colorado, Grand Valley. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
